description: Main customer service hotline available round the clock, 365 days a year. Services: General inquiries, balance checks, package activations, complaints, bill payments.
Technical support hotline for internet and connectivity issues. Peak hours may have longer wait times. Best time to call: 8 AM - 10 AM, 2 PM - 4 PM on weekdays.
Dedicated billing support for bill inquiries, disputes, payment issues, and account adjustments. Not available on public holidays.

hours: 24/7 for critical issues, 8 AM - 6 PM for general inquiries
description: Dedicated line for corporate and enterprise customers. Priority support with faster response times. General inquiries weekdays only, critical issues handled 24/7.
WhatsApp support for quick queries, balance checks, and basic assistance. Average response time: 5-10 minutes. Send 'Hi' to start conversation.
Live chat support available on website. Click chat icon on bottom right. Average response time: 2-3 minutes during operating hours.
Email support for detailed inquiries, documentation submission, and formal complaints. Include account number and contact details in email.
Walk-in service centers for in-person assistance. No appointment needed. Token system for queue management.
Service centers in Kandy, Galle, Jaffna, Kurunegala, Negombo and other major cities.
LankaTel retail stores in shopping malls follow mall operating hours. Services include sales, activations, and basic support.
Social media support for quick queries. DM for account-specific issues. Public posts monitored during operating hours.
Self-service options available anytime: Balance check (*#456#), Data usage (*#789#), Package activation (*#123#), Bill payment (app), Plan information (app), Complaint status (app).
Field technician visits for installations and repairs. Schedule via 1234 or app. Sunday visits available for emergency repairs only (additional charge applies).

LankaTel support availability during public holidays: Hotlines (1234, 1235): 24/7 as usual. Billing (1236): Closed on public holidays. Service Centers: Closed on public holidays. Retail Stores: 10 AM - 6 PM on most holidays. Major holidays (New Year, Vesak, Christmas): Limited services, check announcements.

Expected higher wait times during: Weekdays 5 PM - 8 PM, Month-end billing period (25th - 5th), After service outages, Monday mornings. Recommended: Use self-service options or call during off-peak hours (8 AM - 10 AM, 2 PM - 4 PM) for faster service.
Dedicated VIP hotline for Platinum and Diamond loyalty tier members. No wait times, direct connection to senior agents. Exclusive benefits: Priority callbacks, dedicated account manager assignment.

International support line for customers traveling abroad. Call charges apply based on roaming rates. For emergencies: Lost SIM blocking, international roaming activation, billing queries while abroad.

Interactive Voice Response system available 24/7 for: Balance inquiry (Press 1), Data usage (Press 2), Package activation (Press 3), Bill payment (Press 4), Last payment status (Press 5). No agent required for these services.
Request a callback instead of waiting on hold. Register via IVR, app, or website. Callback within 2 hours during operating hours. Next business day for requests after 8 PM.

Face-to-face video support for complex technical issues. Schedule appointment via app. Useful for: Router troubleshooting, device setup assistance, visual demonstrations. Requires stable internet connection.
Dedicated support for customers with disabilities. Services: Screen reader compatible IVR, extended call time allowance, sign language video support (by appointment), large print document requests.

Dedicated complaints department for escalated issues. Complaint reference number provided. Follow-up within 24 hours. Resolution target: 48-72 hours for standard complaints, 7 days for complex issues.
Support for new connection inquiries, coverage checks, plan recommendations, and application status tracking. Walk-in at service centers recommended for faster processing.
Technical support for LankaTel-sold devices. Services: Warranty claims, device troubleshooting, software updates, trade-in inquiries. Bring device to service center for hardware issues.
Support for small and medium business accounts. Services: Bulk activations, fleet management, corporate billing inquiries, business plan upgrades. Dedicated account manager for 10+ lines.

Automatic notifications for network outages and maintenance in your area. Updates via SMS and app push notifications. Check status.lankatel.lk for real-time network status map. No subscription needed.

Report suspected fraud, unauthorized transactions, SIM swap fraud, or suspicious activity. Immediate SIM blocking available. Investigation initiated within 24 hours. Police report assistance provided if needed.
Dedicated support for LankaTel Pay mobile wallet. Services: Transaction disputes, failed transfers, merchant issues, limit increases, account verification. In-app chat also available.

Emergency services always available: SIM blocking for lost/stolen phones (1234 Option 6), Network emergency for total outage, Critical business line restoration. Non-emergency calls to these options may be redirected.

Extended support during festive seasons: Sinhala/Tamil New Year (April): Service centers open limited hours. Vesak (May): Reduced hours, online support available. Christmas/Year End (December): Extended retail hours, hotlines 24/7. Ramadan: Normal hours maintained. Check announcements for specific dates.
